participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Jake enjoys meeting new people and trying new things.
participant_1.background: I'm from the Midwest, but I love exploring new places and meeting new people. I started collaborating with some popular publishers. I make it a point to keep in touch with my family, even though my schedule can be hectic at times. I got a girlfriend last month. I would love to have lunch with my girlfriend, Luis.

participant_2.name: Ming
participant_2.personality: Ming is laid-back and enjoys simple pleasures like fishing and watching sports.
participant_2.background: I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage. I like to go fishing. I have never been to the west coast of the United States. I own a home where I can watch sports and enjoy my Sprite soda. I have red hair.

content.text: Hey I'm from Iowa but I love exploring new places
Oh cool I'm from a small town in California
Have you ever been to the Midwest?
No I've never been east of the Rockies
You should come visit I'll show you around
Great I'd love to show you around my home state
I'm sure the food is great
It is! I love all the different types of cuisine we have
What's your favorite thing to do there?
I love to go to the state fair
It is I love all the different food and activities
I'm sure it's a great place to visit
It is I hope you can make it out sometime soon
Great! Let me know and I can make some recommendation
